title: Standing Mummiform Statuette of Osiris
description:
Standing bronze statuette of Osiris, mummiform. White crown with uraeus and ostrich feathers. Hands grasp crook and flail. At back of figure, a standing goddess, probably Nephthys wearing horns and sun disk. Large suspension loop at base of Osiris's neck and on left edge of base. No inscription.

Condition: Fair. Considerable corrosion remains. Surface a dull black. Spots of disease on base of figure of Nephthys. Poor work.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
